outputs.output_descr:
Taking in consideration low understanding of CSR in Montenegro, strong impact of crisis on Montenegrin economy and underdeveloped legislation environment for CSR, main objectives are:
• Promotion of Global Compact/CR and creation of active and sustainable  Global Compact Network
• Piloting GC initiatives -  increasing the women's participation in business 
• Enhanced participation of companies in public-private policy dialogues on CR and responsible entrepreneurship

project_descr: Harness value-creating assets of the private sector for poverty reduction in Montenegro through promotion of multi-stakeholder partnerships in the framework of Global Compact.
project_title: CSR and Global Compact in Montenegro
